languages.text: {n}Повстанец сплевывает при звуке вашего имени.{/n} "Так это ты... убийца! Мучитель{mf||ница} невинных! Командир, дай я {mf|его|ее} прямо сейчас приши..."
{n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"
languages.original_text: {n}Повстанец сплевывает при звуке вашего имени.{/n} "Так это ты... убийца! Мучитель{mf||ница} невинных! Командир, дай я {mf|его|ее} прямо сейчас приши..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"
{n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Better kill you here and—"
{n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"
{n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Better kill you right n—"
{n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"
{n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"

languages.text: {n}这个叛军士兵一听到你的名字，就朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“原来是你……杀人犯！折磨无辜之人的刽子手！指挥官，只要你一声令下，我就——”
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个叛军士兵一听到你的名字，就朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“原来是你……杀人犯！折磨无辜之人的刽子手！指挥官，只要你一声令下，我就——”

languages.text: {n}反乱者は、あなたの名を聞いて地面につばを吐く。{/n}「そうか、お前か…殺し屋め！無実の人間を拷問しやがって！司令、命令さえもらえれば俺は—」
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"

traits.locale_text: {n}反乱者は、あなたの名を聞いて地面につばを吐く。{/n}「そうか、お前か…殺し屋め！無実の人間を拷問しやがって！司令、命令さえもらえれば俺は—」

languages.text: {n}Der Rebell spuckt auf den Boden, als er deinen Namen hört.{/n} "Ihr seid das also ... {mf|Mörder|Mörderin}! Unschuldige zu foltern! Commander, erteilt den Befehl und ich ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rebell spuckt auf den Boden, als er deinen Namen hört.{/n} "Ihr seid das also ... {mf|Mörder|Mörderin}! Unschuldige zu foltern! Commander, erteilt den Befehl und ich ..."

languages.text: {n}Le rebelle crache par terre en entendant votre nom.{/n} « Alors c'est vous... espèce de monstre ! Vous avez tué et torturé des innocents ! Commandant, vous n'avez qu'à me donner l'ordre et je... »
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rebelle crache par terre en entendant votre nom.{/n} « Alors c'est vous... espèce de monstre ! Vous avez tué et torturé des innocents ! Commandant, vous n'avez qu'à me donner l'ordre et je... »

languages.text: {n}El rebelde escupe en el suelo en cuanto oye tu nombre.{/n} «Así que eres tú... ¡Asesin{mf|o|a}! ¡Torturador{mf||a} de inocentes! ¡Comandante, dame la orden y...!».
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel spits on the ground at the sound of your name.{/n} "So it's you... murderer! Torturer of innocents! Commander, just give the order and I'll—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rebelde escupe en el suelo en cuanto oye tu nombre.{/n} «Así que eres tú... ¡Asesin{mf|o|a}! ¡Torturador{mf||a} de inocentes! ¡Comandante, dame la orden y...!».

languages.text: {n}İsyancı, adını duyunca yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Demek o sensin... Katil! Masumlara azap çektirdin! Komutanım, emir verin derhâl..."
